author: No_Astronomer2047
comment: there are so many scholarships you can apply for, try to find them and don’t miss out especially with a 4.0 gpa and a cca, you’re definitely going to get it!  i applied for TP scholarship in y1 and it’s so worth it. but at that point of time, my gpa was 3.8 but i didn’t have a cca and i still got selected so you definitely will be a good candidate! good luck!
